column1: #Text='Europe may be failing Syrian refugees, but Canada shouldn\u2019t boast yet'Being able to boast about it is the reason the program exists.
#Text=And the boasting started long before the first refugee arrived in Canada.
#Text=In the G&M alone there were hundreds of articles boasting about it.
#Text=The Canadian trade minister appeared on American TV, made a fool of herself in general and told the audiance Canada will be bringing in 25000 refugees in the next 5 or 6 weeks (Jan 1).
